java/liquibase/preconditions/ViewExistsPrecondition.java

00001 package liquibase.preconditions;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 import liquibase.database.structure.DatabaseSnapshot;
00005 import liquibase.DatabaseChangeLog;
00006 import liquibase.util.StringUtils;
00007 import liquibase.exception.PreconditionFailedException;
00008 import liquibase.exception.PreconditionErrorException;
00009 import liquibase.exception.JDBCException;
00010 
00011 public class ViewExistsPrecondition implements Precondition {
00012     private String schemaName;
00013     private String viewName;
00014 
00015     public String getSchemaName() {
00016         return schemaName;
00017     }
00018 
00019     public void setSchemaName(String schemaName) {
00020         this.schemaName = StringUtils.trimToNull(schemaName);
00021     }
00022 
00023     public String getViewName() {
00024         return viewName;
00025     }
00026 
00027     public void setViewName(String viewName) {
00028         this.viewName = viewName;
00029     }
00030 
00031     public void check(Database database, DatabaseChangeLog changeLog) throws PreconditionFailedException, PreconditionErrorException {
00032         DatabaseSnapshot databaseSnapshot;
00033         try {
00034             databaseSnapshot = database.createDatabaseSnapshot(getSchemaName(), null);
00035         } catch (JDBCException e) {
00036             throw new PreconditionErrorException(e, changeLog, this);
00037         }
00038         if (databaseSnapshot.getView(getViewName()) == null) {
00039             throw new PreconditionFailedException("View "+database.escapeStringForDatabase(getViewName())+" does not exist", changeLog, this);
00040         }
00041     }
00042 
00043     public String getTagName() {
00044         return "viewExists";
00045     }
00046 }
